author: Shilpa Sebastian R
title: How actor Akshith SK is dealing with the delay of his debut film during the COVID-19 lockdown
description: Akshith Shashi Kumar makes sure to keep himself busy even during his stay at home
content: Son of veteran actor Shashi Kumar, Akshith, was all set to have a dream launch this month, when the Covid-19 decided to play spoilt sport and brought the entire nation into a lock-down. The young actors film is titled Seethayana a bilingual in Kannada and Tel… [+2520 chars]
